pages.text: The Blazing Generator can generate power out of blaze rods. But before you can do that the rods have to be processed by the $(l:rftoolspower:powergeneration/blazingagitator)Blazing Agitator$(/l). Note the blazing generator can generate power from up to four blazing rods and works best if it can generate power contstantly. Powering up a generator requires time before it can fully use the full potential of a blazing rod
